about.title: Read News App
about.description1: Mobile app to explore recent headlines, follow articles and read them with a clean, fast and distraction-free interface.
about.description2: Uses The Guardian public API for real-time search, on-demand loading and tab navigation optimized for iOS and Android.
about.authorBody: Project developed by Ramses Gonzalez for Conexa as a sample of React Native + Expo architecture, state managed with hooks and reusable patterns for editorial products.
about.toolsBody: Built with Expo Router for tab and stack routes, custom hooks for fetching (news and users), reusable UI components and button animations to improve interaction feedback.
